inclusion.criterion: Spina bifida as a sole urologic diagnosis
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent and assent (7 years of age and older)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Chronic indwelling catheters in the bladder
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and recurrent UTIs. Urologist not concerned with leaking around suprapubic cath site.
